attributes.action: NHS FOR PETS!! help the elderly to afford keeping their pets- and much more..
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
HAVING A PET SHOULD NOT BE A PRIVILIGE BUT A RIGHT!


to an elderly person their pet may mean everything as many are neglected and or suffer in silence their hardships soemtimes its their only family their pets 
 vet care which goes unregulated hence the  astronomical  costs and even insurance is not either an option as on a pension the elderly can hardly afford the heating for example

a lot of people on low income have too to rely on charities which do not either get any help whatsoever from the government and have in turn to rely on  donations and charge for their care 
which again makes it hard for the elderly and people in general on low income to afford to have and /or keep their pet/s

the avaiability of a animal hospitals all over the country free of charge  for those over 60 and or on low income
would be ideal and make a big difference to so many...

our pets need proper care in a fair 
manner like the human animals do!

thank you for you attention

please do sign this petition

thanks in advance

kind regards
Paula
